description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy ate the fruit as a child in Foosha Village

abilityReveals.description: User twists their legs midair and spins them horizontally like a discus, hovering above the ground while kicking enemies within reach.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Luffy uses this technique to defeat Caesar's satyr subordinates while advancing through the laboratory.
